identity.name: MediFlow
identity.vibe: Professional, Efficient, Human-Centric, Sterile but Warm
principles: Clarity is Safety: Information must be legible instantly.
Warmth in Science: Use soft backgrounds to reduce clinical anxiety.
Density for Pros: Pharmacists need data density; Patients need guidance.

primary.description: Sky 600 - Trustworthy, clear, medical but modern.

secondary.description: Sky 50 - Used for backgrounds to break up white.

accent.description: Rose 500 - For alerts, urgent actions, or 'Call Pharmacist' active state.

usage_rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A).
Pharmacist Dashboard: Use 'Surface' (#F8FAFC) for the main background to reduce eye strain.
Patient Store: Use White (#FFFFFF) for maximum clarity and product pop.
Alerts: Use Rose-500 for 'Verification Required' or 'Stock Low'.

containers.card: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium

inputs.style: border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary rounded-lg bg-slate-50/50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-white/20 (Use for sticky headers)
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for floating actions (like 'Call Pharmacist')
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid slate-200 is the primary separator. Avoid heavy dividers.

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

assets.icons: lucide-react (Use: Pill, Stethoscope, Activity, ClipboardCheck, Phone, ShoppingCart)

general: Implement a 'Light Mode' first approach. Medical apps need clarity.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Do not use generic 'blue' (#0000FF). Use the specific Sky-600 defined in colors.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
patient_flow: Landing Page: Use the 'Tetris Grid' layout. Hero image on left, 'Upload Rx' and 'Order Now' blocks on right.
Cart: Clean, list-based layout. No complex grids for the cart items.
Order Tracking: Use a vertical timeline with 'lucide-react' icons for stages (Order Placed -> Verified -> Out for Delivery).
pharmacist_flow: Dashboard: Split screen. Left 25% is the 'Queue' (list of patients waiting). Right 75% is the 'Workspace' (Rx viewer + Verification buttons).
Verification: Use large, clear buttons for 'Approve' (Green) and 'Reject' (Red).
Call Interface: Simulated video call frame. Use the 'call_action' image as the 'video feed' placeholder.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped (patient) or sharp (pharmacist).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
